title: Park Tae-hwan (footballer)
text:
Park Tae-hwan (born July 29, 1997) is a South Korean <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="Verspah%20Oita">Verspah Oita</a> on loan from <a href="Shonan%20Bellmare">Shonan Bellmare</a>.
Career.
Park Tae-hwan joined <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="Shonan%20Bellmare">Shonan Bellmare</a> in 2016. On September 22, he debuted in <a href="Emperor%27s%20Cup">Emperor's Cup</a> (v <a href="Tokushima%20Vortis">Tokushima Vortis</a>).
Club statistics.
"Updated to 20 February 2017".
